diagnosis.name: Superficial injury of shoulder and upper arm
Positive Serological and/or Viral Culture Findings for Human Immunodeficiency Virus

medication.name: Ambroxol 7.5 mg+Levosalbutamol 0.25 mg+Guaifensin 12.5 mg Oral Drops (1 ml)
Amoxicillin + Clavulanic acid Oral Liquid 228.5 mg/5 ml
Calcimax P Oral Liquid 150 mg/5 ml
Co-trimoxazole Oral Liquid (40 mg + 200 mg/5 ml)
IFA (Ferrous Salt 45 mg + Folic acid 400 mcg) Tablet
IFA (Ferrous Salt 100 mg+ Folic acid 500 mcg) Tablet
IFA (Ferrous Salt 20 mg+ Folic acid 100 mcg) Oral Liquid (1 ml)

advice.name: Do not smoke bidis or cigarettes
Do not eat stale foods and fermented rice
Do not close all the doors and windows while sleeping
Do not eat raw tomato, lettuce, or lentil
Do not brush your teeth with gurakhu
Eat plenty of green leafy vegetables and fruits
Do not study in low light
Regular hand washing with soap and water
Avoid close contact with individuals who have contagious illnesses
Get regular annual/periodic screenings for non-communicable diseases
Manage stress through relaxation techniques & emotional well-being
Consume salt less than a teaspoon (5g) in a day
Healthy timing and spacing of pregnancy (HTSP)
Take folic acid supplementation during planning for pregnancy
Avoid the consumption of unprescribed drugs
Exclusive breastfeeding till 6 months of age
Start complimentary feeding after 6 months of age
Continue to breastfeed in addition to complimentary feeding till 2 years
Age appropriate, frequent calorie dense feeds
Avoid eating junk, oily & spicy foods
Brush teeth twice a day using soft bristles
Limit screen watching time to less than 2 hours in a day
